title: E-Health: From hospital to the nation-wide system
segmentation: Thank you all of you that you joined our presentation.
I will continue what Alex already started and.
There is an additional, let's say 15 minutes.
I would like to vent you through the solutions and offering what the HP is doing, mainly in Central and Eastern Europe.
We feel that it would be useful for Slovenia as well to get this knowledge and sharing the experience.
Starting with with HP in the House, I like to introduce the HP as a big company worldwide.
I will throw down just for the house and explain a little bit more what is the experience and focus of our company in the House.
We have three areas in the globe where HP is quite good.
Delivering the health solutions.
One is in the country where our mother is residing.
It mean in US and in United States we are providing the claim management.
And data operation for the biggest health players in the US.
We are managing their more than a couple of billion claims and data reportes and we are taking care for more than 20 million insured people in US.
The second part we have is in Europe.
That's part of Spain and I will be talking about the hospital information system we implemented in the Spain and the third area, HP is very strong case in Central and Eastern Europe.
We have in our company more than 10,000 people who are focused just on the delivering solutions for.
The house in Central and Eastern Europe.
We are doubling the number of people who are working and focus on the House every two years.
At this moment we have more than 500 experts sitting in Europe and focused focused on this solution.
How the HPC, the whole house ecosystem, HP, started couple years ago with just the technology and technical systems.
HP was known as a producer of the first oscilloscope and entering of HP.
The health sector was mainly in the era of equipment for laboratories.
We started to support this technology with quite high level products and this is.
Our contribution to developing and science in the pharmacy and developing new technologies.
The second pillar HP focused is focused on is digital hospital.
It mean whole solution which is fully supporting activities of all personnel in the hospitals and ambulatory's and the one most important of course is.
Who is paying and regulating the healthcare?
It means the solution which is supporting the digital player.
It means the ministry, source House health insurance companies and organizations who are funding the healthcare on one side on other side.
Who are controlling and defining the rules within the sector?
The system which will be introduced by Thomas Malik later on, is on one side.

Feed it with informations from all types of healthcare because we don't focus only on one particular provider, we need to combine the systems and informations across the whole system and the health sector.
We are feeling that with the source is coming from emergency.
We are supporting the consultations and impatient.
We are supporting hospitals and outpatient as well.
The users of the system are mainly doctors and nurses.
The management for decision support and.
So additional new users of these systems are the regulatory organizations.

It means the organizations who are introducing rules of healthcare in the country and the patient over the last three years, the number of people who are really interested in searching data informations about the health care and about their own health status significantly increased and tomography explained the number of.
People how the patient's number is growing in their interest in accessing these data online.
System system we are talking developed over the last 20 years.

We started with the system which was supporting Caddy beginning just this single hospital or single health care provider and the main functionality of that solution was just supporting the administration.
It means provide him some easy to just to track patient data.
Making the calendar scheduling appointments.
At that moment.
The connections in the countries were quite lousy.
It mean it was not able to share this information when we started this system in Czech Republic, it took between two branches of health prior to transmit the data.
2 weeks.
Because there are no communication infrastructure enough, it means there was sending data just on the floppies between the central Office and district offices.
Weekly it mean the two weeks just to send the data from one place to another place.
Then it ever developed to the more detailed health data kept in the systems, and in this moment we are running the system which is fully centralized.
It means allowing everyone to access data from everywhere supporting different communication channels.
It means it could be on the PC, in the hospitals, it could be accessible over the Internet from the PC, but it could be accessed even from the mobile technology.
From the emergency car when the emergency is going to pick up some urgent cases on the.
Streets.
The system you are meeting in the hospital is covering industry errors.
One error if you are taking care for one particular patient, you can drill down into details about these patients.
You see all the medical results and medical informations about this one particular person and you can drill down into details of outcome of all exams as well as the details about his previous.
Oscar.
The treatment.
You are using the system to manage the hospital.
As it is, it mean you can visualize how the hospital looks like.
You can see the capacity and capability you have on different places of the hospital.

You can check whether and which people are aware and you are supporting distributing of medical medical stuff, drugs as well as the fruit and directing doctors to the proper place where the patient is sitting.
And the sad part of the solution is the reporting.
It mean you have consolidated access to all your medical history.
Each patient you have the tools which are supporting.
The reporting of the hospital to the healthcare pray there and you see there all the contracts and contractual stuff which is required for daily operation.
How is the healthcare payer system is combined on the two levels on the strategic level and operational level with three key errors?
One area is the premium collection country by country.
We have different systems.
Who is collecting the premium?
In some countries the money for healthcare funding are given from the governmental budget, it means.
They are collected as a part of tax.
The system we are talking about is able to collect the money directly from premium payers like Czech Republic.
The premium is paid and deducted from the salary and insurance company in the player is collecting the money from themselves from the size per interview.
Just for your imagination we are talking about approximately 250,000 premium payers for 10 million people.
Collecting the payments every month.
The second operational part is the claim management over the last 20 years we went through all types of healthcare funding you can imagine.
We started to develop the system which was based fee for service for consolidated claim reporting.
It means no individuals where described on the report and we went through all the development from the consolidated bills to individual bills.
GP General Practicians paid per capita.
There is schemes of DRG and this moment insurance is trying to introduce so-called package services.

It means they want to agree with the health care provider about the specific type of service defining for this type of service price, which will be paid and report it, and paying all the health care providers according their capacity and.
Probability which is contracted between the payer and the health care provider.
From size POV we are talking for 10 million people.
We have 100 million claims per year.
It mean every citizen in average is creating 10 reports for from the hospital or health care provider per year.
Which is quite huge amount of data to be processed every day.
Financial operations, that's the standard part of solution in each organization needs to run the legal, financial, and controlling activities on the strategic management level.
We have that House care management.
It means the quality quality tool.

Having approximately 20,000 health care providers in the country and people having the free choice where they are going for their service, it's quite difficult to manage the quality and compare with health care providers treating the patients well and which health care provider has the quality lower 'cause it is not just about the financial impact of the treatment, it means the cheaper is most efficient.
This is not true.
We have an experience is with the two health care providers living in the same place.
In the city, if anyone would expect they have the same cost becausw on the same side of the city, same salaries.
One health care provider was quite cheap.
Second one was much, much more expensive and then going into data we found that there is a lot of patients coming to one hospital who was very very cheap.
They spend their few days, three to five days and then the doctors send them home as the case was closed then after.

10 days The people went back becausw the same disease occurs once more, which was more serious because it was repeating after that and they went to another hospital because they were scared and afraid to go to first one.
It means from financial point of view and duration of the state it looked at.
The 2nd hospital is significantly more expensive and divorce.
But reality combining data across the whole system showed that the 2nd hospital is taking care for.
The faults of the first one.
Exchanging data within the system we were talking just about hospitals, healthcare, praise and Ministry of House.
We learned over these 20 years that the registers and informations within the health system and the.
And all these databases are one of the most accurate sources of data for the whole government.
I mean, so we have the contact with the people every say two to three months with the majority of people.
And the the people have the problem.
Hide behind the behind this or against the healthcare.
It means there is a lot of experience when the police and the government is approaching this system just to find out more details about their inhabitants.
Electronic health record.
This, as I mentioned, is something where we are combining data from the private inputs of the people we are combining data about the cost of their healthcare.
It means what the health payer paid for these people and we are combining data from the health care providers.
It mean on one place the patient could find the data, what was funded and reporting it.
Since this cost cost view on his.
Jelsa he can find under one place data about his inputs given by health care providers and he is getting on this place.
The advices of the Doctor, where to and how to continue with his.
Treatment.
Two largest implementations and places where the system is up and running.
We have in in Romania, Romania having 22,000,000 populations with 27,000 health care providers is quite quite large country.
We implemented and started to run the system in 2008 and since then we are operating for 13 years.
Having the contract for.
Keeping the system up and running according to the new.
All.
The second largest implementation we have started in 1992.
It means more than 18 years experience and operation in Czech Republic, where we are covering the whole lifecycle of data and information and patient within the system for the whole country.
I will hand over to Thomas Matic to continue in more details about short description how the system is is constructed and who is using the system.

On one side you find the insured people and the patients who are getting the service and paying through their employer the money for the healthcare services in the center you will find the two legal bodies regulating and defining the rules and paying the health care in the health insurance.
Administer of house.
The second key contributor for the rules is Ministry of Finance, who is defining the rules of funding.

It mean what is funded and how it is going to be funded and the prices and the rest of the government utilizing the registers and consolidating data from health care for the reporting to government, which is a police, justice and statistical office.
In this moment I would hand over to Tomasz.
